title: Chamish - Shabtai Tzvi, Labor Zionism and the Holocaust (1993).p
description: This is Barry Chamish&#039;s amazing book Shabtai Tzvi, Labor Zionism and the Holocaust (1993) which exposes the effects of Shabtai Tzvi, a 17th century messiah, on the history of modern Israel. Chamish&#039;s books have dramatically changed the way Israelis view their history. In this volume he puts all the pieces together and solves the mystifying issues of modern anti-semitism, anti-Zionism and Holocaust.  In a breakthrough of Jewish scholarship, he traces Israel&#039;s current distress to the 17th century false messiah, Shabtai Tzvi.  Author&#039;s research is finally collated into this fascinating book, to create a truly horrifying story of political corruption that continues to this very day. Discover who the modern players are, their politics involving Israel and the Jewish people, and their plans for the state of Israel and its people. The religious beliefs of the follows of Shabtai Tzvi continue to affect us today. Find out how it all began. 235 pages. A must read for everyone.
